plant.question: I have a bright yellow face and follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am a type of flower.
☀️ I am named after something in the sky.
💛 Bees love to visit me for my seeds.

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am a fruit.
🌴 I grow in warm places.
🐒 I am long and bendy.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
🍔 I am often used in cooking.
😭 I have layers.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals. People often give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a flower.
💌 I am often a symbol of love.
🛡️ Be careful of my sharp points!

plant.question: I am a tall tree with leaves that turn bright colors in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves are a symbol of Canada.
🍂 I lose my leaves in the winter.
🥤 My sap can be used to make a sweet treat.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that is long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 Eating me is good for your eyesight.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water and has large, round leaves that float. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on me.
💧 I need water to survive.
🌸 Some of my flowers are very beautiful and large.

plant.question: I am a plant with a trunk and branches, but I don't have leaves. I'm often found in deserts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have spines instead of leaves.
🏜️ I can store water for a long time.
☀️ I like hot, dry weather.

plant.question: I am a plant that can trap and eat insects. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I need nitrogen from insects.
🌿 I grow in nutrient poor soils.
👄 I have a clever trap.

plant.question: I am a type of plant that grows on other plants but doesn't harm them. I get my nutrients from the air and rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I am an epiphyte.
🌳 I often grow high up in trees in rainforests.
💨 I don't need soil to grow.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on trees.
⚽ My shape is like a crescent moon.
💛 My color rhymes with 'canary'.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red, green, or yellow. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees and I am a popular snack.
🥧 People use me to make pies.
🍎 My name is the same as a very large tech company.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Baby cows drink me!
🥛 I am often fortified with Vitamin D.
🥣 I am needed to make a good bowl of cereal.

food.question: I'm a long, orange vegetable that rabbits love to munch on. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Some say I am good for your eyesight.
🐇 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. I can be sliced and used to make sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 People eat me everyday.
🥪 Sandwiches usually need me.
🔥 I need to be baked.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made from sugar, butter, and flour. I often have frosting on top and come in different flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 People celebrate birthdays with me.
🍰 I am often covered in frosting.
👨‍🍳 You need to bake me.

food.question: I am a frozen dessert that is sweet and creamy. I come in many flavors and people scream for me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am best enjoyed in the summer.
🍨 I'm often served in a cone or a cup.
🗣️ People 'scream' for me.

food.question: I am a dish made from cooked pasta and a sauce. I come in many shapes and sizes, like spaghetti, penne, and macaroni. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 You can twirl me on a fork.
🍅 I am often served with tomato sauce.
🇮🇹 I am a very popular food in Italy.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches and comes in many colors, like green, red, and purple. I can be eaten fresh or made into juice or raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on vines.
🍷 Some people use me to make wine.
☀️ I can be dried to make a chewy snack.

food.question: I am a seed that pops when heated, turning into a light and fluffy snack. I am often eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob.
🍿 You can add butter and salt to me.
🎬 People enjoy me at the cinema.
